review_text: They are cups.  There are 12 of them, they are nice and durable, I was able to write on them in permanent marker with no problem so the kids knew which cup was theirs.  They are not BIG cups, but that is actually perfect for my students.
product_name: Ikea Kalas 101.929.56 BPA-Free Tumbler, Assorted Colors, 6-Pack, Set of 2
